security.item: Move authentication to server-side with secure HTTP-only cookies instead of localStorage
Hash passwords using bcrypt before storage (requires backend implementation)
Implement CSRF protection tokens for form submissions
Add rate limiting for login attempts to prevent brute-force attacks
Use HTTPS for all communications (enforce in server configuration)

stability.item: Implement error boundaries in JavaScript with global error handling
Add offline support using Service Workers for basic functionality
Validate and sanitize all user input on both client and server sides
Implement proper loading states and error recovery mechanisms
Add browser storage quota monitoring to prevent overflow errors

ux.item: Add visual feedback for loading states during page transitions
Implement keyboard navigation support for accessibility
Add dark mode toggle with persistent preference storage
Improve mobile touch interactions with larger hit targets
Add task filtering/sorting functionality for better usability
